verses.roman:
"kavitva nā haya ei amṛtera dhāra
nāṭaka-lakṣaṇa saba siddhāntera sāra

synonyms: kavitva—poetic art; nā haya—is not; ei—this; amṛtera dhāra—constant shower of nectar; nāṭaka—a drama; lakṣaṇa—appearing as; saba—all; siddhāntera sāra—essences of ultimate realization.
translation: Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya said, "This is not a poetic presentation; it is a continuous shower of nectar. Indeed, it is the essence of all ultimate realizations, appearing in the form of plays.
